data.title: Which of the following is the official language of Nicaragua?
data.meta_description: Spanish The Republic of Nicaragua is a country situated in the central American Isthmus The official language of the country is Spanish
data.text:
Q. Which of the following is the official language of Nicaragua?

Answer: Spanish

Notes: The Republic of Nicaragua is a country situated in the central American Isthmus. The official language of the country is Spanish.

8
